name: prudential-life-insurance-assessment
data_intro: Can you make buying life insurance easier?

cat_feature_intro.Medical_Keyword_1-48: A set of dummy variables relating to the presence of/absence of a medical keyword being associated with the application.

num_feature_intro.Id: A unique identifier associated with an application.
num_feature_intro.Product_Info_1-7: A set of normalized variables relating to the product applied for
num_feature_intro.Employment_Info_1-6: A set of normalized variables relating to the employment history of the applicant.
num_feature_intro.InsuredInfo_1-6: A set of normalized variables providing information about the applicant.
num_feature_intro.Insurance_History_1-9: A set of normalized variables relating to the insurance history of the applicant.
num_feature_intro.Family_Hist_1-5: A set of normalized variables relating to the family history of the applicant.
num_feature_intro.Medical_History_1-41: A set of normalized variables relating to the medical history of the applicant.
num_feature_intro.Response: This is the target variable, an ordinal variable relating to the final decision associated with an application
